item.author: dealnews.com

item.title: HP Pavilion dv4i Intel Core i5 2.53GHz 14" Widescreen Laptop for $964 + free shipping

That's a $450 savings and the lowest total price we've seen for an Intel Core i5-equipped laptop. Sales tax is added where applicable. This 5.2-lb. notebook features an Intel Core i5-540M dual-core processor (with Turbo Boost up to 3.06GHz), 14.1" 1280x800 widescreen LCD with BrightView, 4GB RAM, 320GB 7200 rpm hard drive, ATI Mobility Radeon HD 4550 512MB video card, Blu-ray ROM / dual-layer DVD burner, 802.11n wireless, webcam, 12-cell battery, and Windows Vista Home Premium 64-bit. Coupon ends after 1,800 uses. To get this deal:
  1. Click here to start at $799.99
  2. select "Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-540M processor (2.53GHz) (+$75)"
  3. select "FREE Upgrade to 3GB DDR3 System Memory (+$0)"
  4. select "320GB 7200RPM SATA Hard Drive... (+$40)"
  5. select "512MB ATI Mobility Radeon HD 4550 Graphics (+$100)"
  6. select "Blu-ray ROM with SuperMulti DVD+/-R/RW... (+$200)"
  7. select "12 Cell Lithium Ion Battery (+$49)"
  8. add to cart for $1,263.99
  9. apply coupon code "NBTW34871" to knock the final price to $963.99

item.title: Pocono Mountains: Free night at select hotels with stays of up to two nights
item.description: Stay up to two nights at one of six select hotels at the Pocono Mountains and get an extra night for free. A best bet are two of the Joe Boxer Women's Pajama Sets (pictured, available in 36 patterns) for $9.49. With $6.95 for shipping, that's $8.22 per set and the lowest total price we could find. They're available in sizes S to XL.

item.title: Wacom Intuos3 Professional 4x6" Graphics Tablet for $100 + free shipping
item.description: Costco offers its members the Wacom Intuos3 Professional 4x6" Graphics Tablet, model no. PTZ431W, for $99.99 with free shipping. (Non-members pay $5 more.) That's $10 under our October mention (which was after rebate hassles) and the lowest total price we could find by $90. Plus, it comes with 100 Costco photo prints for free. Sales tax is added where applicable. This PC- and Mac-compatible tablet includes a cordless mouse and pen, finger-sensitive touch strip, five programmable buttons on the mouse, four on the tablet, and more.

item.title: Sambazon Acai Power Scoop for $10 + free shipping
item.description:
Amazon.com offers the Sambazon Acai Power Scoop for $13.57. Choose "Subscribe & Save" and it falls to $11.53. At check-out, apply coupon code "SAMB6521" to cut it to $10.17. With free shipping, it's an $11 drop and the lowest total price we could find by $10. This freeze-dried Acai powder purports to boosts energy and your immune system.

You can cancel Subscribe & Save at any time, even immediately after the order.

item.description: Amazon.com offers the Eureka Tent and Camp Duffle for $12. Shipping adds $5.58, but orders of $25 or more qualify for free shipping. Even with shipping, it's the lowest total price we could find by $7. It holds a tent and features an exterior pocket for stakes and floor savers.

item.title: Pike Street Microfiber Twin XL Comforter Set for $30 + free shipping
item.description: Amazon.com offers the Pike Street Microfiber Twin XL Comforter Set in Pink/Lilac for $30.30. With free shipping, that's $90 off list and the lowest total price we could find. This down-alternative comforter set is machine-washable and features 100% polyester construction and fill. The twin XL-size set includes a comforter and one pillow sham.

item.title: Toshiba Satellite Intel Dual Core 1.3GHz 13" LED-Backlit Laptop for $524 + free shipping
item.description:
Microsoft Store offers the 3.8-lb. Toshiba Satellite T135-S1312 Pentium Dual-Core 1.3GHz 13.3" Widescreen Notebook for $524.30 with free shipping. That's $225 off and tied with last week's mention as the lowest total price we've seen. Sales tax is added where applicable. This 3.8-lb. laptop features an Intel Pentium Dual-Core SU4100 1.3GHz ultra low-voltage processor, 13.3" 1366x768 widescreen LED-backlit LCD, 4GB RAM, 500GB 5400 rpm Serial ATA hard drive, 802.11n wireless, memory card reader, three USB ports, HDMI output, Bluetooth 2.1+EDR, webcam, 6-cell battery, and Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit.

Note: It doesn't have an internal DVD or CD drive.

item.description: CollectionsEtc.com offers this ATM Piggy Bank for $10.97. With free shipping, via coupon code "3G9262", it's $7 under list and the lowest total price we could find. Features include a digital readout, ATM card and keypad with sound effects, bill feeder, and more.

item.description:
At Yankee Candle, get $10 off orders of $25 or more via coupon code "88HBJB". It beats yesterday's mention which required a higher purchase to qualify for the $10 off. Shipping starts at $6 and sales tax is added where applicable. Coupon expires January 30.

item.description: TradePub.com offers a free 1-year subscription to Web Wholesaler magazine. Published 12 times a year, this magazine covers e-commerce businesses and online auction sellers. Only "qualified" individuals are eligible. Nearly 300 other titles are also available.
